solution_line_template: He bought enough grass seed to cover {covers_per_bag} * {bags_bought} = <<{covers_per_bag}*{bags_bought}={total_coverage}>>{total_coverage} square feet.
Thus, the leftover grass seed can cover {total_coverage} - {lawn_area} = <<{total_coverage}-{lawn_area}={leftover_coverage}>>{leftover_coverage} square feet.
